mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Bless Your Pea Pickin' Heart", "Space Boots", "I Feel Better", and "Utah Traveler". ROUND DANCES "Bubbles in Wine", and "Fancy Pants". SPECIAL FEATURES "The Use of Mixers in Today's Square Dancing", "Employer-Employee Square Dance Relations", "Sunny Hills Celebrates", ""The Squares Went Over the Mountain"", "The British Scene", and "Central Pennsylvania Goes Western". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I See Itt", "From the Floor", "Square Dance Picture", "Round the Outside Ring", "Chuck Jones Note Book", "Square of the Month: Tommy Thomas", "Paging the Roundancers: Forrest and Kay Richards", "Style Series: Wash the Clothes", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
